title: Ok 2 eat products that have disclaimer of possible haram substances but ingredients are halal? Assim
transcript: there are labels on like apple juice like cheese sandwich like vegetable sandwiches and they say that the ingredients nothing is haram but they as a disclaimer for legal reasons they say there might be some contamination why do do they say this so that no one would sue them so if the ingredients are halal you can go ahead and eat it inshallah
